entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:47 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waskaganish Airport 10:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -14.2°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -17.0°C
Wind: S 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
